Welcome to my website! I am a PhD candidate at the Finance Department of Stockholm School of Economics. My main research interest is empricial asset pricing and market microstructure, with a special focus on the market inefficiency due to investors' inattention and information frictions.  

My full CV is available [here](files/Zabor_CV_2017_Q4.pdf).
